item.title: Dr. Lingwei Kong
item.description: I graduated from the University of Amsterdam & Tinbergen Institute. I am an assistant professor of Econometrics (tenure track) at the University of Groningen, currently focusing on the identification robust techniques in linear factor models. If you have any questions or comments, please feel free to contact me at l.kong@rug.nl; and here is my CV. Email: l.kong@rug.nl Phone: 0031-(0)-685438594 Office: 5411.0771, Duisenberg Building, Nettelbosje 2 9747 AE Groningen
